T02D3677:308b-1: t'a r'a to ba bi dhi:/
T02D3677:308b-3: sgrol ma'i khrus kyi cho ga / rje btsun ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3677:308b-4: khrus kyi cho ga la gsum ste /
T02D3677:308b-8: dang po ni gnas yid dang mthun par phyag dar la sogs pa byas te /
T02D3677:308b-9: bum pa mtshan nyid dang ldan par rdzas gzhan dang mthun par bsags te /
T02D3677:308b-10: shel med du mi rung mchod pa rnams sta gon bya'o //
T02D3677:308b-11: dngos gzhi ni sngon du gsungs pa'i rim pa stong pa'i ngang las sems nyid t'am dkar por blta'o //
T02D3677:308b-12: de las 'od 'phros bsdus nas bdag nyid sgrol ma
T02D3677:308b-13: mdog dkar mo padma dang zla ba la rdo rje
T02D3677:308b-15: zhal gcig phyag gnyis mnyam gzhag gi steng na bdud rtsi'i bum pa bsnams pa /
T02D3677:308b-16: rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang ldan pa
T02D3677:308b-17: 'od 'phro ba dang bcas pa'i sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu
T02D3677:308b-18: rgyan can du bskyed par bya'o //
T02D3677:308b-19: bum pa yang mi dmigs pa las phyi bum pa
T02D3677:308b-20: la nang rin po che'i gzhal yas khang bcud bdud
T02D3677:308b-21: rtsi'i rgya mtsho'i dbus su padma'i pa dra'i sdong po
T02D3677:308b-22: la rang 'dra ba'i dam tshig sems dpa' bskyed /
T02D3677:308b-23: de'i mdun na las kyi khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dmar ser bzhengs pa /
T02D3677:309a-0: @309a * // zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa'i thal mo sbyar ba'i dbus
T02D3677:309a-1: na rin po che'i bum pa bdud rtsi 'bab pa
T02D3677:309a-2: bsnams pa / zhi ma khro gtso ma la blta ba bsam mo //
T02D3677:309a-3: de dag la ye shes pa gzhug dbang bskur rgyas gdab /
T02D3677:309a-4: de nas rdo rje gzungs thag dang bcas pa bum
T02D3677:309a-5: pa'i steng du bzhag rang dang bum pa'i lha gnyis
T02D3677:309a-6: ka'i thugs kar zla ba la sa bon dang bzlas
T02D3677:309a-8: rang gis gzungs thag bzung nas ngag tu /
T02D3677:309a-9: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re aa mri ta kunda li ha na ha na /
T02D3677:309a-12: sarba p'a pam h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D3677:309a-13: zhes brjod pas sngags gzungs thag la 'khril nas bum
T02D3677:309a-14: pa'i lha gnyis po'i thugs kar phog de las 'od
T02D3677:309a-15: 'phros de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs bskul /
T02D3677:309a-16: ye shes kyi bdud rtsi spyan drangs lha gnyis po'i
T02D3677:309a-17: bum pa la phog bdud rtsi lud 'og gi bdud
T02D3677:309a-18: rtsi dang dbyer med du bsam mo //
T02D3677:309a-19: de ltar gso sbyong la gnas pa dus ni tshes
T02D3677:309a-20: brgyad nas pha rol gyi tshes brgyad kyi bar ram
T02D3677:309a-22: rtags ni chu khol ba la sogs pa dang lha'i zhal mthong ba'o //
T02D3677:309a-23: rjes la ye shes pa gshegs te dam tshig pa
T02D3677:309a-24: rang la bsdus nas rang lha'i nga rgyal gyis rang
T02D3677:309a-25: gzhan chu nges bkrus nas sdig pa la sogs te
T02D3677:309a-26: mi mthun pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3677:309a-27: sa phyogs kun du gtor na yang nad zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3677:309a-28: phyugs la gtor na phyugs nad zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3677:309a-29: me la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa la gtor na 'jigs pa thams cad spong ngo //
